name: drawRadialGradient(_:startCenter:startRadius:endCenter:endRadius:options:)
desc: Paints a gradient fill that varies along the area defined by the provided starting and ending circles.
declaration:
func drawRadialGradient(_ gradient: CGGradient, 
            startCenter: CGPoint, 
            startRadius: CGFloat, 
              endCenter: CGPoint, 
              endRadius: CGFloat, 
                options: CGGradientDrawingOptions)
